text: Nɨbi nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol olap tap yokɨp agɨl gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Yad nɨbop agebin, ensel ñapay sɨkol anɨb okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal okok, kɨli Bapi ne man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak pelpel wulep sɨŋak mɨdebal agak. Mɨdɨl, ñapay sɨkol anɨgɨl mɨdebal takaw anɨb ak, Bapi nop agñɨbal agak.18.10-11 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, gos kɨli anɨgɨl mɨdeb, takaw ogɨnap sek mɨdeb. Takaw anɨb ak anɨb agup, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne lum awl owak ak, binɨb kul gak okok kɨlop dɨnɨg owak agup.
